name: Star Ball (itch)
description:
Control your starball with your mouse. Time to time, white circles spawn and try to trap you. DON'T TOUCH THE WHITE CIRCLES! Use your surrounding to your advantage or vanish from the universe. Select different game modes in the main menu. (Music can be muted from the top-right corner).

Controls:

Movement - Mouse

Restart - Right Click or "R"

Main Menu - Escape
